Wallet¶

The class for creating HD wallet (BIP32).

class pybgl.Wallet(init_vector=None, passphrase='', path_type=None, init_account=None, address_type=None, testnet=False, hardened=False)[source]¶

The class for creating wallet object.

Parameters

  • init_vector – (optional) initialization vector should be mnemonic phrase, extended public key, extended private key, by default None (generate new wallet).

  • passphrase – (optional) addition to mnemonic phrase

  • path_type – (optional) “BIP44”, “BIP49”, “BIP84”

  • address_type – (optional) “P2PKH”, “P2SH_P2WPKH”, “P2WPKH”

  • testnet – (optional) if set to True mean that this private key for testnet Bitcoin network.

get_address(i, chain='external')[source]¶

The class method for creating a wallet address.

Parameters

  • i – index

  • chain – “external”, “internal”
